full_text: Four more years of Jair Bolsonaro in charge could devastate the Amazon, where much of the rainforest could turn into dry savannah        https://t.co/SPAay4DGY9

localize.full_text: ジャイル・ボルソナロの政権があと4年続くと、アマゾンは荒廃し、熱帯雨林の多くが乾燥したサバンナに変わってしまう可能性があります https://t.co/SPAay4DGY9
